newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Liberty denies talks with Manila's Bayantel.
newsitem.headline: Liberty denies talks with Manila's Bayantel.

text.p: Liberty Telecoms Holdings Inc denied on Wednesday it was engaged in exploratory talks with Bayan Telecommunications Holding Corp (Bayantel), the telecommunications unit of Benpres Holdings Corp.
Brokers said rumours of a joint venture talks fired up Liberty on Tuesday as it climbed 29 centavos, or 42.65 percent, to close at 92 centavos amid heavy trading.

"We wish to inform you there are no exploratory talks between the corporation and ICC-Bayantel at the moment, although management does not rule out the possibility of future business opportunities with any party," Liberty said in a statement.
Liberty said its management did not know of any information that might have affected the sharp price appreciation.
